text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in Primary Malignant Neoplasm Disorder Value Set
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Specific Diagnosis of Cancer Value Set
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Carcinoma In-Situ Disorder Value Set
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Melanoma In-Situ Disorder Value Set
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Benign Neoplasm of Brain and CNS Disorder Value Set
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Cytologic Evidence of Malignancy Value Set

name: PrimaryCancerDisorderVS
title: Primary Cancer Disorder Value Set
description: Types of primary malignant neoplastic disease, coded in SNOMED CT or ICD-10-CM.
